parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Saves all variables stored in [[profileNamespace]] to the (persistently stored) active [[Profile]].

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Warning</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>This command triggers a file operation. As file operations are slow (even on SSDs), it is not recommended to use this command too frequently (i.e. several times per second).</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>important</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Do not save large amounts of data to the profile; the larger the profile file gets, the slower it loads!</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Heliport status (used in the Career mode for example) is stored in the file that is modified by this command, so be mindful of this to avoid losing data and progress.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''saveProfileNamespace'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[profileNamespace]] [[setVariable]] ["TAG_lastPlayerLocation", [[getPosASL]] [[player]]];
[[saveProfileNamespace]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[profileNamespace]], [[Profile]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">17:34, 25 November 2011‎</dd>
<dt class="note"><template><title>User</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Joris</value></part></template></dt>
<dd class="note">Variables are also saved when the game is quit.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
